items: Adjust the cable machine to a high position and attach a rope handle.
Stand facing away from the machine and grasp the rope handle with both hands, palms facing each other.
Step forward to create tension in the cable and lean forward slightly, keeping your back straight.
Bend your elbows and lower the rope behind your head, keeping your upper arms stationary.
Extend your arms and raise the rope back to the starting position, squeezing your triceps at the top of the movement.
Repeat for desired number of reps.
Targets the triceps muscles, helping to build strength and size in the arms
Allows for a greater range of motion compared to traditional triceps extensions
Engages the stabilizer muscles in the shoulders and core, improving overall upper body stability
Can be easily adjusted to target different areas of the triceps by changing the angle of the bench and cable attachment
Provides a low-impact exercise option for those with joint pain or injuries
Single Arm Cable Incline Triceps Extension
Reverse Grip Cable Incline Triceps Extension
Close Grip Cable Incline Triceps Extension
Wide Grip Cable Incline Triceps Extension
